ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Leaving EQ for Sex?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... as ... Actually, that /was/ humor, just a sort of intellectual kind, perhaps a bit too subtle. ===== Coffee contains water...so does your pee Web:
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> wrote:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: KAZ [mailto:kazvorpal@...]
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Leaving EQ for Sex?
> --- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> wrote:
>> > HAHAHHA stop please - I'm dying here!
>> > Besides, everyone knows Barbarians are better than wood elves =x
>
>> I was going for size disparity, but while the halfling is shorter the wood
>> elf would be the most different from the ogre in /build/ plus height
>> combined. Barbarian and ogres don't contrast enough at all.
>>
>> They should let us play half-orcs, like in AD&D. There's a weird new
>> expansion concept...a whole city of orcs for the half-orc players to use
as
>> a
>> base.
>
> Well I was just trying to be funny because Halana is a barbarian :)
> But no offense intended you don't seem to be in a humorous mood today.

Actually, that /was/ humor, just a sort of intellectual kind, perhaps a bit
too subtle.

=====
Coffee contains water...so does your pee
